1.content: What kind of super powers do you have?
1.title: Super Powers!

info.brief_description: Take on the role of a powerful superhero with an embarrising weakness.
info.description:
You are Phenom, a powerful superhero in a city filled with crime. Defend your city from common criminals, supervillains, or even alien invaders, but remember that they will all try to exploit your ticklish weakness.

Keep the focus on tickling and don't use established comic, movie or cartoon characters.
